p: Medicinal herbs are used traditionally to treat illnesses, promote health and maintain well-being. 8 The aqueous extracts of various plant parts (leaf, stem, root and bark) are used for medicine preparation because they contain biologically active ingredients. Grewia mollis Juss (Malvaceae) is one of the medicinal herbs that is used traditionally to treat chronic diseases and related pain by the Hausa tribe in Nigeria. 9 It is widely distributed in northern Nigeria, 10 known as Dargaza in the local Hausa language ( Figure 1). G. mollis also grow in other parts of tropical Africa, from Senegal on the west coast to Zimbabwe on the south coast ( Figure 2). 10, 11
